activities: ACA Compliance Group (ACA) provides compliance consulting and GIPS® verification and performance review and consulting services to investment advisers, private funds, investment companies, and broker-dealers.  During the course of, or in order to provide its services, ACA may receive personal data about prospective, current, or former customers or employees who are residents of the EU. Generally, any personal data collected, processed, used, and transferred is subject to ACA’s Website Privacy Policy.
personaldata: Online, Customer and Human Resources Data
recoursemech: To resolve any disputes involving ACA's human resources data, we agree to cooperate with the respective EU DPAs. We agree to resolve all disputes involving any other types of personal data held by ACA in accordance with the BBB EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program.
